byline: Adam Allington, Annie Baxter, Tim Fitzsimons, Nova Safo, Sam Weiner, Daniel Kibblesmith, Kai Ryssdal and Stan Alcorn
description: Airing on Friday Dec. 12, 2014: If there’s a global surplus of oil, where's it sloshing around? We look at how countries are stockpiling. Plus, with inflation low, we ask what's the ideal rate. Finally, American household debt has fallen in comparison to incomes. We investigate the “magic number” for debt loads in a healthy economy.
title: Marketplace for Friday December 12, 2014
teaser: Airing on Friday Dec. 12, 2014: If there’s a global surplus of oil, where's it sloshing around? We look at how countries are stockpiling.
